changes: Services from Excel file with prices in float number being ignored issue resolved
Update pop up appearing when the versions didn't match issue resolved
author: Tahir Alauddin
description: Regenixx is a software for a medical office. It is used for creating personalized printable pdfs for the patients with different pricing and plans.

changes: PDF Total Price spacing issue resolved
PDF Total and Subtotal calculation bug fixed
Patient Records can be deleted now
Quantity attribute for services added
Pricing format is changed to $ 00.00 in both PDF and UI
Shortcuts added for Save Diagnoses, Upload Images and download Plan
Download Updates window icon added
Patient Table Database Bug fixed
updater.exe file not being called issue resolved
Auto Update feature added.
Patients information saved in database now
Added pause, resume, and cancel download feature.
Fixed minor bugs.
Project Intialized.
Drag and Drop Features.
UI and UX.
PDF generating logic.
Diagnosis saved in database.
